attributes.action: Re-open disused railways lines in Oxfordshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Re-open Witney to Princes Risborough rail line via Oxford. Re-open the Didcot to Southampton line. Re-open the Woodstock/Abingdon/Grove/Wantage/Faringdon/Wallingford/Watlington branch lines.
In order to help sort out the terrible road congestion in Oxfordshire (A34/A40/M40/Oxford ring road), provide an alternative means of transport and help to move to a sustainable future
